titleStmt.title: To the Most High and Mighty Monarch, Charles the II, by the grace of God, King of England, Scotland, France and Ireland, defender of the faith Thomas Pecke of the Inner Temple, Esq. wisheth an affluence of both temporal and eternal felicity, and most humbly devoteth this heroick poem in honour of His Majesties establishment in the throne of his ancestours.
titleStmt.author: Pecke, Thomas, b. 1637.

titleStmt.title: To the Most High and Mighty Monarch, Charles the II, by the grace of God, King of England, Scotland, France and Ireland, defender of the faith Thomas Pecke of the Inner Temple, Esq. wisheth an affluence of both temporal and eternal felicity, and most humbly devoteth this heroick poem in honour of His Majesties establishment in the throne of his ancestours.
titleStmt.author: Pecke, Thomas, b. 1637.
